short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Jujutsu Kaisen cursors for Chrome! Choose your favorite anime cursor with this extension, perfect for Jujutsu Kaisen fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jujutsu Kaisen Cursor Extension Features:

- Give you different Jujutsu Kaisen cursor design for you to replace default cursor.
- Click on the task bar extension icon located at right hand top corner to open up Jujutsu Kaisen cursor setting box.
- Quick access to More cursor theme in setting box.
- Quick access to play games.

-------------------
! After installing this extension, refresh the previously opened tab if you want to use it on this page.

! According to the rules of the Chrome Web Store extension cannot work on the store pages and home page.

Please open any other website (for example, google.com) after installing this extension and check how the extension will work on it. Refresh the page if the cursor didn't show up.

-------------------

If you have any questions about our Jujutsu Kaisen cursor extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you.
